(:action remove ; Remove an item from a bike
    :parameters (?p - person ?b - bike ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?b) (attached ?item ?b))
    :effect (and (not (attached ?item ?b))

(:action fill ; Fill or attach a resource to an entity
  :parameters (?p - person ?entity - object ?resource - resource)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?entity) (not (attached ?resource ?entity)))
  :effect (attached ?resource ?entity)
)
